Summary: There was a bright trinagular object that came form nowhere it was so huge it went over my brother neice and sister in law it was tringular in shape with just red lights on it
divs: Sighting Detailsi would like to note this has been happening from august 30th 08 until this day of september26th 08.i I had took my dogs out for a walk at my home 1437 bell brook and i looke d up in the sky and shaw tinkling lights from the north, east , west and south . So i decided to get the dogs in and just as i had my brother calls and says hey sis do you see those lights in the sky , i said yes he said he would be right over sO my neice my brother and sister -in-law and my neices boyfriend came over . We all had binoculars so we went down the side walk to a empty feild by the hose and watched these objects that where dics shape , as we were doing that all of a sudden this thing apeared from no where it had red lights it went over all of us and it was so huge you could see a diamond shape on the belly . It had no arplane sound at all and it dissappeared as quick as it had come . A nd every since that night these disc shaped objects have been in the sky from all directions with red , blue or green lights dancing around on them. T onight i wemt out and looked and there was at lest 5 out the slowly dissapear after a while we are not ccrazy we have seen these i would swear on a bible , w e were not scared we were like amazed at this big object that had went over us it was so huge ,we all beleive that there is something out there.
